title: Mate2237
author: Mate2237
created_time: January 30, 2023, 07:13:12 PMLast edit: January 30, 2023, 07:32:57 PM by Mate2237
content: This thread is for those who are looking for the NFL thread which I created here and later moved to Gambling Discussion board. Pls clink here to make commentsWhy di Thread was Moved 2 Gambling Board? The thread was moved to Gambling board bcuz di thread talks about gambling and here na local board so weti u talk here e no dey count as gambling but as a local board count, and we r toking about sport e no make sense. So dat is why I moved am go there, so u can click di link nd make ur comment there. How to Make Comments in di Thread? Many pple e won 2 make comments but since there is no channels 2 watch di local league e don become a problem for dem. Let me tell you even do you no know weti 2 tok for gambling board, dis naija thread is one of di best thread. You can get di information from NFL, NPFL from their social media handles, and also for those who dey use startime can also get it from NTAsport channel. The link again. here. Pple r looking for the thread, dat is why I create dis thread.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Thank you boss for the notification and clarification. I don reason the mata and wetin you yan really make sense, so that our posts for there go count under gambling section. Like I told you earlier I go do my best to dey make meaningful contribution to the thread and I implore everyone here to do same. Na our league, na our identity, na our pride, so make we showcase am to the world. Who knows, like play like play we fit sign Messi come NPFL.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on January 30, 2023, 07:13:12 PM()~E make sense like that, me sef done put eye look for the thread multiple times and I no see amm before,  but this thread were you creat make me see the link again why I like waiten you talk about the movement of the thread to gambling discussion board be say. -NFL is a national competition that gain International recognition even FIFA is aware and follow up with the competition, so I no see any reason why the thread should be in the local board in the first place. -as we all know that gambling is one of the major sponsors around the world and in the forum, so any poster who is not well informed and knowledgeable in all games most popular football and other gambling games will not be able to enroll in their sponsorship in this forum, but with little information and news one should be able to make quality comment in gambling section so your post quarter will be approved by the team. -As e be like this, myself go follow your advice take know more about this local league.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Currently Nigerian Football League is going on and the matches interested, you can watch it from GOTV, DSTV and Startime etc. You for make comments there so far Dem go fit count ur post 4feom there too. Day place fit make things easy for u. E don tay wey we make comments 4 there. Make we go do am so piple go know saw we get league 2.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: I neva come across the thread for gambling discussion board before and I saw that it was created since December, 2022. The reason wey we no know about am be say e no too get too much engagement and our people for here no too dey watch the NPFL and are more current with the leagues in Europe. But na we go hype our own to make am popular too. Another reason be say we no too get plenty viewing channels where dem dey show the matches even if some of us dey interested in football and will love to go and see our favourite teams play. Thank you for providing us with channels we can watch the matches from and also where we can get real time updates about them. As the new season wan start, we go try follow engage to make the thread busy for gambling board too.

Pple r looking for the thread, dat is why I create dis thread. Making a post here to bring to everyone notice seh., una don abandon the nigeria premier league board. The new season will commence in september and dem oga don complete fixture list this evening. Make una join me for that thread; its lonely there.ireee ooo

comments.author: Sim_card

Make una join me for that thread; its lonely there.ireee oooThat thread should be on the 100th page by now because we only have few Nigerians in this forum and not everyone that is a football lover. Among the rest that are football lovers,most of us don't like NFL because it isn't as classic and upgraded compare to the European leagues due to poor management and corruption. I no dey even watch their match wey I no go fit place my bet. So a lot of us that are football fans,prefer to watch the common and strong leagues where we can place our bets and enjoy the fun.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: After the creation of the thread, and moved it gambling discussion, many people never see am because the thread dey go down well well and that was why this thread was also create to support that thread and anyone who never see am there can go there from here and I thank those who bumped this thread. I really appreciate your concern . New season is coming again and let us storm di thread to inform other country people say we are also here.

comments.author: Lorokan
comments.body: Quote from: Sim_card on August 30, 2023, 08:57:53 AMThat thread should be on the 100th page by now because we only have few Nigerians in this forum and not everyone that is a football lover. Among the rest that are football lovers,most of us don't like NFL because it isn't as classic and upgraded compare to the European leagues due to poor management and corruption. I no dey even watch their match wey I no go fit place my bet. So a lot of us that are football fans,prefer to watch the common and strong leagues where we can place our bets and enjoy the fun.Fortunately; the NPFL Discussion is not on the 100 page; infact it is closer than you can imagine; and this is because i have dropped some updates about the NPFL in recent times. Dem don postpone the start of the new season cos of Adverts and Sponsors; you can follow up and join the NPFL Discussion as well.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Mate2237 on September 07, 2023, 08:35:45 AMAfter the creation of the thread, and moved it gambling discussion, many people never see am because the thread dey go down well well and that was why this thread was also create to support that thread and anyone who never see am there can go there from here and I thank those who bumped this thread. I really appreciate your concern . New season is coming again and let us storm di thread to inform other country people say we are also here.I just dropped a comment on that thread,  in the gambling discussion section I have hard the thoughts of getting some updates lately most especially updates on current standing,  a commentator got my attention sometime last week and what I hard the season is not too favorable to Rivers united and other top clubs in the NFL league. Please check and let me know if I made any mistake or if you have current updates to feed me with.

comments.author: Mate2237

Please check and let me know if I made any mistake or if you have current updates to feed me with. New update has been dropped so you can go and check it. Lorokan has also made the same update here and there. When the new date of the season comes out I will still inform everyone here and there for people to be aware of the game. Rivers e United has been a weak team but I will not say anything about them yet.
